name: Kingdom Days Sim Date
summary:
Kingdom Days Sim Date是由Pacthesis制作的约会模拟游戏。 
于2010年9月5日发布。

Kingdom Days Sim Date is a romantic dating simulation game for girls.

Build relationships with boys in a small medieval town of a foreign kingdom ruled by an arrogant king. Play as the princess of the Lunar Kingdom, a long lost member of a royal family who grew up in an orphanage.

5 dateable characters, 6 different endings
